A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it.  I'm a lifelong Starwars fan\, having grown up watching the VHS of episode IV.  That said\, I'm not that fan that has read and consumed everything that the Galaxy has to offer.  I liked the parallels and nods to the original flicks.  I also loved the departures.  Well done Rian and all.  Looking forward to IX.
